00020 //! Base class for filters that resize the image.
00021 class PLFilterResize : public PLFilter  
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   //! 
00025         PLFilterResize(int NewXSize, int NewYSize);
00026   //!

00028   //!

00030

00032   int m_NewXSize;
00033   int m_NewYSize;
00034 };
